itunes:title: Bonus: Episode 1 of Criminally Booked..A True Crime Story Paired with Fiction Book Recs!
title: Bonus: Episode 1 of Criminally Booked..A True Crime Story Paired with Fiction Book Recs!
description:
In Episode 58 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee (on vacation this week) are sharing theirÂ  Patreon Exclusive bonus episode called Criminally Booked! If you enjoy this episode and want to hear Episode 2,Â  head to our Patreon to sign up today!

**If you enjoy the podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + our ALL NEW CRIMINALLY BOOKED! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons all for just $5 a month!

Welcome to the first episode of Criminally Booked! Like many people, weâ€™re fascinated by crime, both true and fictional, and we wanted to create a segment that combines the two. Criminally Booked gives us a space to share true crime stories while also sharing helpful resources, laws that have been enacted, and other pertinent information.

With these true crime stories, we're also tying in fiction book recommendations that we will be bringing exclusively to our patrons first! We hope you enjoy what is a reoccurring bonus episode topic for Patrons of Book Talk, etc!

Now-on to the case of Francine Hughes...

**Content Warnings for Domestic ViolenceÂ 

Books MentionedÂ

Finding Mrs. Ford | Deborah Goodrich Royce ðŸŽ§

Surrounded by Narcissists | Thomas EriksonÂ

Narcissist Apocalypse Podcast Â

Sources

If you are experiencing domestic violence, call the National Domestic Violence Hotline at 1âˆ’800âˆ’799âˆ’7233 or chat with a worker at https://www.thehotline.org/.
